website_summaries.verdict: Versatile set with well-designed paddles and an assortment of ball and shuttlecock options. Bright paddle colors that are easy to see.
pros: Full set with pair of paddles, two shuttlecocks, a ball, and storage bag
Foam grips span the length of the neck, so hands of all sizes can hold onto it easily
Shuttlecocks are made with real feathers and are ideal for kids to practice
cons: Ball seems to be a bit harder and heavier than traditional game balls

customer_reviews.title: Fun and great for indoors!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought Jazzminton after reading other reviews and so glad I did! This was a huge hit in our house! Love that fact that you can play indoors and it keeps the kids active and off their devices!! It's simple to play and does not damage walls, furniture, etc.. The red "birdie" is for slow play and the yellow one is for faster play. Paddles are sturdy yet lightweight! Fun game!
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Such Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and they are quality pieces and so much fun! The paddles are sturdy, not cheap material. The feather and rubber birdies are also sturdy and well made. My dog grabs them when they hit the ground, cuz he wants to play too, and he hasn't damaged them. I got these for our family to play with during the COVID quarantine and we have hours of fun daily with them. The # for us to beat is 127 back and forths :) My children are in their 20's and love these. They would be great for all ages! Get them and get outside, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great game and easy for just about anyone to play
customer_reviews.text: Great game and easy for just about anyone to play! The paddles have a nice color and are comfy to hold. They have birdies which you can play even in the house or closer together and the other two birdies are great to play in the backyard or pretty much anywhere. We also tried the ball but that’s a little too hard for us but the teenage girls love that. Everything fits just perfectly into the carry bag which is included. Very fun and it is so nice not to be concerned about having a net!! Highly recommend if you have kids and want to keep them occupied for a while and having fun!
customer_reviews.author: Bada

customer_reviews.title: with everyone getting bored with it pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: There were no game rules so all we did was TRY to volley the feather shuttlecocks back and forth, never reaching over 10 times because they wouldn't fly straight. And that was with the 'slow' ones. Different people tried playing it off and on for an hour maybe, with everyone getting bored with it pretty quickly. After that short of time, one of the handle's soft rubbery stripes starting coming off!
customer_reviews.author: john & barb cage

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the price and quality of this set
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the price and quality of this set. The bright colors will be easy to see on sand or grass, and the drawstring bag makes it a cinch to gather up and toss in the car. I purchased two sets, as my grandkids always have cousins and friends along.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S. Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Really Fun Paddle Game!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun paddle game! I got this set to play in the pool during summer and we always have a blast when we play. The feather birdies were so easy to use and the ball is perfect for the pool. Everything in the set is excellent quality so I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fun and addicting
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the lite version first, it was so fun I had to buy this version to play with more people. Love the affordable price, the rackets are sturdy and hold up well. Overall, it's very fun and addicting to play this game, can get quiet a good workout especially if playing in a tennis court. The reason why I didn't give five stars is because of the birdies. The rackets are well made but the birdies are weak, they are fun to play with but after a game, one part of the birdie would fall out. Wish the birdies were as sturdy as the rackets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, keep an eye on foam grip as it could slip
customer_reviews.text: It is a good bat/racquet because we were playing in doubles inside the house and we accidentally hit the wall many times and still no damage visible not even decoloration. The only reason to give 4 stars is that the foam keeps slipping off and one time it accidentally came out totally. I had to glue it with the bat, i hope if it was glued by sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Shah

customer_reviews.title: Fun for whole family during pandemic!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever for the kiddos (and me) to get some movement and fun during pandemic! This thing is so easy to play with right away and me and my 12 and 10 yr old love to play outdoors or indoors too! It comes with a few birdies and a ball and it’s great in case one goes up on the roof. We have the classic Smashball too but my kids and I prefer to play with this set more.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Macias

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this out of desperation, honestly. My son is home from college due to the pandemic and he is bored to tears. He is a tennis player so I thought that he might enjoy getting outside and playing a racquet game with his 50 something year old mom. We have had a ball with this!!! I am going to purchase one for my daughter and her boyfriend she is a nurse and he is in medical school. Great stress reliever for them. Highly highly recommend and the price is awesome! Thank you for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chondra Kaklis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love these. It was a great starter kit. I ordered two sets to play as teams. We play for hours, it’s perfect for everyone, I even purchased more regular birdies, fast birdies, led birdies, and wind birdies. The kids have a blast and they get their physical activity and trust me so do you.
customer_reviews.author: SandraSanessa

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game to give my grandchildren something to do outside that would give them some exercise but would also be fun and competitive while we are quarantined due to Covid-19. It's so much fun. Even the adults want to play so I am planning to purchase a second set so we can play doubles!
customer_reviews.author: Dlee5

customer_reviews.title: Addictive and well
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this game for our upcoming beach trip for my daughter whir is 9 years old. Of course we had to try it out and now we can’t quit playing!! It’s so much fun once you get the hang of how the birdie flies. A little tricky in the wind but that’s with any sport. We took it to her brothers t-ballgame last night and kids were waiting to try it out. A 4-year old even got the hang of it!!
customer_reviews.author: tring

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t sure if they would like them or if they would be cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my kids for Easter. Wasn’t sure if they would like them or if they would be cheap quality... presently surprised! My kids range from 7-16 and they have played with them daily. Great quality and the birds have held together with all the use. They want me to get more!
customer_reviews.author: Mandee Black

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to play in my basement with my 12yo daughter during the stay at home order. She has wanted to play everyday, multiple times per day and it has been tons of fun for both of us. I would highly recommend this set!!
customer_reviews.author: MomMD

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Too fun! Played this in the living room the night I gave it to my son 😋 He won. I bought two sets for him as his wife’s family loves games. They were a hit! Paddle foam slipped off the wood handle but slipped right back in easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great paddle ball game set. The reason that I didn't give a higher score is that the feather shuttlecocks fell apart quickly. That was a big part of the set.
customer_reviews.author: john&ansley

customer_reviews.title: Got us off the couch
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this product is to get us off the couch doing the pandemic and it did. We could play indoors and outdoors I like the flexibility. I would recommend this product to anyone. Very affordable
customer_reviews.author: MRyan

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome both my son's 10 and 13 have fun playing with these. It even got my 10 year old off video games lol. Very sturdy, the feathered birds are made well. Bright and fun! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: callie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money !!!
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted some extra things to do with the kids and this is definitely fun for us all...just kind of hard on a windy day..I’m actually about to order another set so we can all play together.
customer_reviews.author: Heatherkay53

customer_reviews.title: It's like ping pong or badminton without the net.
customer_reviews.text: It's fun. The kids enjoyed it for a little while. Might be more fun if a net was included, but then it would be called something else wouldn't it? A good quality toy. Not so much plastic stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Grandma

customer_reviews.title: NOT easy to play!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried playing many times, but don't be fooled! The "birdies" or balls, are way more challenging than what you may remember when you played badminton before. The teens get frustrated and the adults can't get more than two or three in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Charstie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Fun
customer_reviews.text: The customer service was super helpful to my experience as a consumer. Thank you Judith for a wonderful prompt reply! The birdies fly in the air beautifully, and the rackets are sturdy. It's great for kids and parents during this coronavirus qurantine time. I found that playing with the rackets and birdies fun both indoors and outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Goggleman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: The feathers are already falling out, and the ball split apart after hitting it maybe 5-6 times. The grip on the paddle keeps wanting to slide off. It’s been fun...while it lasted. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up! Perfect for All Ages!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Jazzminton’s easy set up and wonderful travel case. We’ve enjoyed the social distancing outside fun with extended family. It’s perfect for kids and elderly alike. Please give suggestions for weighting down the base.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Very fun game and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: My family has had so much fun with this set. Much better than badminton. The customer service department for this company is excellent and very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Walthard

customer_reviews.title: This is so much and had to order another set.
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun with our family and friends that we had to order another one so that we all can play. It's fun and works when its little windy.
customer_reviews.author: Dhaval Patel

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for indoor/outdoor activity. It's affordable and I can't stop playing with it. Got it as a birthday gift, and I'm pretty sure my brother and I are going to be playing with this set a lot for summer. Thanks for the awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Owlkat

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this as a gift to our kids during Christmas vacation and they played it everyday! They were really good at it after a couple of days. It came with a ball as well, but they liked playing with the birdies the most. Great toy for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: H. Melzer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth buying, it’s a blast!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set to play during the quarantine, and it is a total blast!!! It’s so easy to play with, and the birdies fly well and make the game last and allow for long rallies! Inside the house or outside! A total deal for the fun it brings. Would recommend giving this as a gift too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to play. The sound is makes is also very satisfying. You can play indoor or outdoor so I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Khoa Bui

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game! Can use with and without a net, and portable too. Family has enjoyed this when we don’t feel like putting up the badminton net!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: Once you get the hang of it, it's super fun. We all play it together and our kids range 26 down to the grand at age 5.
customer_reviews.author: S. McCord

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandchildren to have an activity outdoors, or indoors. They are enjoying it and it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: cheri graves

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this at the beach. Paddles were very sturdy but one of the grips came off (got a little competitive!) but easy to put back on. Ball and accessories also sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Momoflots
customer_reviews.text: Great game. We bought it for our seven year old daughter, but her older brothers and sisters love it too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sauls

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for both indoor and outdoor even if it’s windy. Good exercise and really easy to learn. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Can’t collapse it
customer_reviews.text: So I’ll have followed the instructions and still am not able to collapse it to put back in round, cloth carrier. So I am not able to store it easily but most important, I’m not able to transport it to family events which was the reason I bought it. I would have returned it but I kept thinking I would be able to collapse it and I also got sick so missed the deadline to return it by about one week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun! The quality of the wooden paddles and the feathers are great. This game is a great way to get the kids off of the video games and get some exercise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun with very little investment
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun with very little investment. At delivery, I thought it looked cheap... but, my nephew loved it. The whole family ended up playing. You may want to purchase additional birdies.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to play with my son in our yard during the Covid-19 lock down . It is fun to play and gets us outdoors for some exercise. We are having lots of fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Beth Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game and came with a bag to keep everything together. Perfect for camping trips
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is actually really fun. I like that it comes with the birdies, and a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: jazzminton
customer_reviews.text: exceeded my expectations. since being quarantined i was looking for something to keep a 7 year old entertained indoors and as it turned out we had the most fun and laughs. the product is well made and the size is perfect for all of us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: The paddles are hard (more like ping pong paddles); they have no flex and do not work as expected for beach paddle paddle ball. Also only comes with 1 ball which broke first day of use. Would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Blake

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this with a few games to my neice and nephew. They played with this at their summer park party with a bunch of other kids. They loved this and the other games I sent. Scored with this choice!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: my boys loved this game!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 and 6 year old LOVE this game! It is fun and has great aim and direction, making it accessible for anyone to play!

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Just received this, perfect for my daughter to play and I to play outside. The rubbery tips allows the shuttlecock to bounce when it hits the pavement, and the paddles are solid and comfortable to hold. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carole A. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Missing most of items
customer_reviews.text: I’m waiting on the replacement as it only came with the paddles??????? Missing majority of items. No ball and no shuttlecocks. Weird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to play this but the ball broke after the first hit. It is quite frustrating that the ball is in such a bad quality.

customer_reviews.text: This is a game all of our five kids like to play. You can be successful when you first open it and become more skilled. It's fun and entertaining and will give you plenty to laugh about!

customer_reviews.text: Quality is very good. Paddles are light, so for my children it very easy to hold : 4,5 and 2,5 years. Playing is for pleasure.

product_meta.title: Funsparks Jazzminton Paddle Ball Game with Carry Bag - Indoor Outdoor Toy - Play at The Beach, Lawn or Backyard - 2 Wooden Racquets - 4 Shuttlecocks - 1 Ball
feature_bullets: FULL SET INCLUDES: 2 fluorescent wooden paddles, 1 ball and 4 birdies; 2 red birdies for slow play, 2 yellow for fast and a durable carry bag. Jazzminton paddle game is an exciting, fast paced outdoor game for kids and adults. Get outdoors with Jazzminton and have a blast

QUALITY MATERIAL: Paddles are 7-layer plywood with water resistant paint and moisture wicking soft rippled foam grip handles for comfort and long lasting use. This racquet game combines the best of pickle ball, badminton, tennis and ping pong in to one extremely fun all-season game

RELIABLE BIRDIES: Our shuttlecocks are made from real feathers that are attached with water resistant glue to ensure nothing breaks if playing at the pool, beach or even if it rains. Great for improving coordination, motor skills and keeps you active away from phones, TV’s and video games

BEST OF ITS KIND: Jazzminton Paddle Ball has 5 versions to choose from for whatever indoor or outdoor occasion you are looking for; Ages 6+, the fluorescent paddle is 12.8” (32.5cm) long and 7.3” (18.6cm) wide

ENDLESS FUN: Amazing indoor game and outdoor games for kids & adults: The birdies slow as they spin creating an exciting game with long rallies great for all ages. You can even play over a badminton net, great way to introduce racket sports to children or beginners
